sentences.english: The book, The Chronicle of Chen Yuan′s Life with Illustration is a seriously written work with academic value.
sentences.chinese: 《陳垣年譜配圖長編》是一部嚴謹有加的學術著作。

sentences.english: Some other necessary supplementary materials were also added to A Chronology Of Shen Zufen's Life.
sentences.chinese: 《沈祖棻年譜》中的紀事也需要作必要的補充。

sentences.english: The appendix is a complete chronicle of QianChengzhi and a diagram showing his family's ancestry.
sentences.chinese: 文章末尾附錄完整的錢澄之年譜和家族世系傳承表。

sentences.english: 'Zhu Qizhan Chronicle' was released by Shanghai Literature & Art Publishing House.
sentences.chinese: 《朱屺瞻年譜》由上海書畫出版社出版。

definition: short comment or critical appraisal added at the end of a text, on a painting etc
to annotate/to add marginal comments on/criticism/marginalia
variant of 匯編|汇编[hui4 bian1]

Prime tortoise of the record bureau, Song dynasty historical encyclopedia of political essays, autobiography, memorials and decrees, compiled 1005-1013 under Wang Qinruo 王欽若|王钦若 and Yang Yi 楊億|杨亿, 1000 scrolls
to transcribe/to make a fair copy
